name: アザリスの迷宮
description:
A fantasy world with forests and snowlands centered on the gloomy goddess religion Azarith and its labyrinth.

Players make adventurers and challenge numerous labyrinths, and mix good old 3D exploration dungeons, real-time battles, and card-like choices in this RPG.

It is said that in ancient times, there were seven demons who stole the power of creation from the goddess Azarisu. The demon turned the world into chaos, and people and the way to the goddess were closed in a labyrinth. Yes, it is reported in the goddess religion nation Azarith.
The goddess religion welcomes adventurers to pave the way to the goddess.
